item.description:
Athena's is one of the country's premier adult novelty party plan companies.Learn more about athena and their products from independent distributor Wendy Ramsdell.

Athena's carries over 300 products of the highest quality - from bath & body, pampering, massage, reading and view pleasure and of course toys!


There will be a large product display, prizes, raffle and much, much more! Feel free to participate in my Mystery Host Game - Anyone who brings in $100 in orders will be placed into a drawing ~ the winner will be the mystery host - meaning it would be like you had a party -without the house to clean, invites to send out, food to make - but all the benefits!

So come by and see what all the buzzing is about!
If you are unable to make, You can still place an order ~ Give Wendy a call!


NO ONE UNDER THE AGE OF 18 IS ALLOWED ON THE PREMISE!!
Given the adult nature of this product minor will not be allowed!
item.name: Athena's By Wendy -Open House-8-11 am/3-6 pm
